## ScriptHostOptions.pingInterval property

Optionally specifies the interval, in milliseconds, that the host shall ping the underlying sandbox to determine whether it is unresponsive

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
pingInterval?: number;
```

## Remarks

The default value is `2500`<!-- -->. Specify zero or a negative value to disable pinging.
